text: yeonghon-i hananim-ui heolag eobs-i jugneun il-eun iss-eul su eobs-euni gilogdoeeo iss-eumyeo gihan-i jeonghaejyeo issnola. hyeonse-ui bosang-eul wonhaneun jaga issdamyeon na(hananim)neun geuege geugeos-ui ilbuleul jul geos-imyeo naese-ui bosang-eul wonhaneun jaga issdamyeon naneun geuege geugeos-ui ilbuleul jul geos-ila. naneun gamsahaneun jadeul-ege bosanghal geos-ila
